overview: Six diverse college students end up at the mercy of an occult ritual after deciding to attend the biggest party of the year, on Halloween night, hosted by fellow student James Pitman. Loyalty, love, and friendship come into question, as the will to survive rears its ugly head, in this twisted, supernatural fright-fest that ultimately reveals the true evil, dark nature of mankind.
tagline: Experience the True Evil, Dark Nature of Mankind
title: Evil Dark
